welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Neibu, Taiwan! Known for its bustling markets, delicious street food, and beautiful temples, we invite you to immerse yourself in our city's charming culture and explore all that it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pingtung Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pingtung Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Kaoshiung International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newly built terminal, primarily serving international flights and airlines.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 3 hours.
